amendment.description: Amendment strikes terms such as "Oriental" and "Negro" from two sections of title 42 of the U.S. Code, and replaces them with culturally appropriate terms.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 36 printed in House Report 114-359 to strike terms such as "Oriental" and "Negro" from two sections of title 42 of the U.S. Code, and replaces them with culturally appropriate terms.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Ms. Meng.
